alert.note: Alert for Cowley; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:23PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cowley and eastern Sumner Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 522 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wellington, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arkansas City, Wellington, Belle Plaine, Oxford, Geuda Springs, Maple City, Strother Field Airport and Wellington Airport. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 7 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central Kansas.
